title: A CEO’s Secrets to Better Sleep
itunes:title: A CEO’s Secrets to Better Sleep
description:
Nikki and Mark pick apart some confusing news from the World Health Organization that seemed to declare the Caribbean region free of Zika, and discuss the destinations that you should and shouldn’t worry about visiting. Then Ron Carson, chief executive of Carson Group, offers indispensable tips for getting great sleep in hotel rooms.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
